mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_SEQ, ORDER_NUM, DELIVER_COMPANY FROM ORDER_LIST O, DELIVERY D WHERE DELIVERY_STATUS = '2' AND O.ORDER_SEQ = D.ORDER_SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_LIST SET DELIVERY_STATUS = '3' WHERE ORDER_SEQ = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_SEQ AS ORDER_SEQ, D.ORDER_NUM AS ORDER_NUM, D.DELIVER_COMPANY AS DELIVER_COMPANY, S.SELLER_SHOP_NAME AS SELLER_SHOP_NAME, P.P_NAME AS P_NAME, U.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME FROM ORDER_LIST O, DELIVERY D, PRODUCT_INFO P, G2_SELLER S, G2_USER U WHERE O.ORDER_SEQ = #{value} AND O.ORDER_SEQ = D.ORDER_SEQ AND P.PRODUCT_SEQ = O.PRODUCT_SEQ AND S.SELLER_ID = P.SELLER_ID AND U.USER_ID = O.USER_ID
